Create a research compendium

Source: R/new_compendium.R
new_compendium.Rd

This function creates a new files/folders structure according to the research compendium paradigm. The project can be (if required) installed as an R package.

new_compendium(
  status = "concept",
  lifecycle = "experimental",
  cran = TRUE,
  codeofconduct = TRUE,
  check = FALSE,
  deploy = FALSE,
  create_repo = TRUE,
  given = NULL,
  family = NULL,
  short = NULL,
  email = NULL,
  orcid = NULL,
  github = NULL,
  license = NULL,
  overwrite = FALSE
)

Arguments

status

a character. One among 'concept' (default), 'wip', 'suspended', 'abandoned', 'active', 'inactive', or 'unsupported'. This will add a Repo Status badge to the README.Rmd. If you don't want to add this badge, set status to NULL. For further information see add_repostatus_badge().
lifecycle

!!! ADD !!!
cran

a boolean. If TRUE adds a CRAN version badge to the README.Rmd. Default is FALSE (this badge is more appropriate for an R package).
codeofconduct

a boolean. If TRUE (default) adds a Code of Conduct badge and a paragraph to the README.Rmd. The content of the Code of Conduct is also added at the root of the project.
check

!!! ADD !!!
deploy

!!! ADD !!!
create_repo

!!! ADD !!!
given

a character of length 1. User given name to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
family

a character of length 1. User family name to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
short

a character of length 1. User short name to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
email

a character of length 1. User email address to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
orcid

a character of length 1. User ORCID to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
github

a character of length 1. User GitHub pseudo/organization to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
license

a character of length 1. User preferred license to be used for this project. Default is NULL and the value of this parameter will be obtained from the .Rprofile file (if set_credentials() was previously used). For further information see set_credentials().
overwrite

a logical value. If a make.R is already present and overwrite = TRUE, this file will be erased and replaced.

Details

...

See also

Other setup functions: new_package(), refresh(), set_credentials()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
rcompendium::new_compendium()
}
